title: About Play8
intro: At Play8, we're passionate about tennis and helping players of all levels improve their game. Our name represents our commitment to providing infinite possibilities for your tennis practice.
founded: Founded in 2023 by a group of tennis enthusiasts, Play8 was born from a simple idea: make high-quality tennis ball machines accessible to everyone through an easy booking system.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to help tennis players practice effectively on their own schedule. We believe that consistent practice is the key to improvement, and our ball machines provide the perfect opportunity for focused, repetitive training.

machines.title: Our Machines
machines.description: We offer state-of-the-art tennis ball machines at various locations. Our machines feature:

features.batteryLife: Battery life of up to 4-6 hours

steps.practice: Practice as long as you need
